# MAMA Documentation Index
# https://jungjaehoon-lifegamez.github.io/MAMA

## Overview
MAMA (Memory-Augmented MCP Assistant) is an always-on AI companion that remembers decision evolution.

## Packages
- @jungjaehoon/mama-os: Standalone AI agent with Discord/Slack/Telegram bots
- @jungjaehoon/mama-server: MCP server for Claude Code/Desktop
- mama-core: Shared embedding and database components

## Documentation

### Tutorials
/tutorials/getting-started.md - Quick start guide
/tutorials/first-decision.md - Save your first decision
/tutorials/understanding-tiers.md - Tier system explained
/tutorials/hook-setup.md - Configure auto-recall hooks

### Guides
/guides/installation.md - Complete installation
/guides/standalone-setup.md - Set up always-on agent
/guides/gateway-config.md - Discord, Slack, Telegram setup
/guides/mobile-access.md - Access from any device
/guides/troubleshooting.md - Common issues
/guides/standalone-troubleshooting.md - Standalone issues
/guides/configuration.md - Configuration options
/guides/security.md - Security best practices

### Reference
/reference/commands.md - Slash commands
/reference/api.md - MCP tool API
/reference/skills-api.md - Skills system API
/reference/hooks.md - Hook configuration
/reference/configuration-options.md - All config settings

### Explanation
/explanation/architecture.md - System architecture
/explanation/mama-os.md - MAMA OS dashboard
/explanation/decision-graph.md - Decision evolution
/explanation/semantic-search.md - How search works
/explanation/tier-system.md - Tier design
/explanation/data-privacy.md - Privacy principles

### Development
/development/contributing.md - How to contribute
/development/developer-playbook.md - Architecture standards
/development/testing.md - Test suite
/development/code-standards.md - Coding conventions
/development/release-process.md - Release workflow

## Quick Install

# MAMA OS (Standalone)
npm install -g @jungjaehoon/mama-os
mama init && mama start

# MCP Server
npx @jungjaehoon/mama-server

# Claude Code Plugin
/plugin marketplace add jungjaehoon-lifegamez/claude-plugins
/plugin install mama

## Links
- GitHub: https://github.com/jungjaehoon-lifegamez/MAMA
- npm: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@jungjaehoon/mama-server
- Issues: https://github.com/jungjaehoon-lifegamez/MAMA/issues
